Definition at line 75 of file mutex.hpp.

int32 uStreamLib::Mutex::tryLock (  void   )  [inline]
 

Try to lock the mutex. This method check if I can lock the mutex. If not, then it returns FAILURE.

Returns:
SUCCESS or FAILURE if the mutex cannot be locked, ie is locked my another thread.
